resources.string: 1)If someone holds you from neck or shoulder /n2)Be calm and bring yourself to the attacker. At the same time , poke both of your thumbnails into the eyes. Attack with your entire body weight and press the nails deeply. Be quick

2)Be calm and bring yourself to the attacker. At the same time , poke both of your thumbnails into the eyes. Attack with your entire body weight and press the nails deeply. Be quick and use 200% of your power and body weight.
3)A close up of how the thumbs are poked into the eyes,
4)Keep walking towards him and throw your entire body weight into his eyes.
5)Finally grab his head and pull him towards you.
6)When you pull him towards yourself,at the same time kick him with your knee in his stomach or lower abdomen or groin. Be quick.
